OTE: The following four variables were created by using a combination of variables from the following sections: Recoded Mental Health
Services Utilization and Recoded Alcohol and Drug Treatment. Specifications on how the individual Recoded Adult Mental Health Service
Utilization variable was defined can be found above. Specifications on how the individual Recoded Alcohol and Drug Treatment variable was

column1: <s>defined can be found in the Recoded Alcohol and Drug Treatment section.</s>
